vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Freebie.GetFreebie (patch_14.sol#12-17) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_14.sol#14)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_14.sol#15)

external-function

solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_14.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_14.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Freebie.Command (patch_14.sol#24-30):
	-! adr.call.value(msg.value)(data) patch_14.sol#27-29
